DIA_Griz_QA301_Adelard_03_02: Great! So what do we do?
DIA_Griz_QA301_Adelard_15_03: First, we will go through the forest alone, without farmers or goods. We will clear it of all animals, or at least those near the path.
DIA_Griz_QA301_Adelard_15_04: We'll set up at regular intervals, and when I get to the end of the path, I'll let the nearest one of you know it's safe.
DIA_Griz_QA301_Adelard_15_05: You'll take it in turns and keep an eye on the farmers as you move the crates. All clear?
DIA_Griz_QA301_Adelard_03_06: What sign would that be? I suggest lighting a fire at the end of the path. Visible from a distance, it further deters animals, and is unlikely to be started by someone random.
DIA_Griz_QA301_WrongWay_03_01: Boy, what are you doing? Our target is the other way.
DIA_Griz_QA301_SeeThat_03_03: There, in the thicket. A shadowbeast! It went somewhere out there in the woods...
DIA_Griz_QA301_SeeThat_15_04: I don't think we need to worry about him. Just clean up around the path.
DIA_Griz_QA301_SeeThat_03_05: Come on, a trophy like that? If I bring his horn to Garos, maybe he'll accept me into the trackers!
DIA_Griz_QA301_SeeThat_03_06: Besides, that beast might come closer and threaten the farmers! We must get rid of it!
DIA_Griz_QA301_SeeThat_Yes_15_01: You're right, let's go hunt it down.
DIA_Griz_QA301_SeeThat_Yes_03_02: Great! Maybe I should lead if you haven't seen it?
DIA_Griz_QA301_SeeThat_Yes_03_04: This monstrosity is about to regret crawling out of its cave for a moment!
DIA_Griz_QA301_SeeThat_No_15_01: There's no need for that. Stay here.
DIA_Griz_QA301_SeeThat_No_15_03: Yes, really. I'll go check the end of the trail and light the fire, and then you'll signal the others. You got that?
DIA_Griz_QA301_SeeThat_No_03_04: Yes, I understand, what not to understand...
DIA_Griz_QA301_SeeThat_No_15_05: Very well. I'll see you later.
DIA_Griz_QA301_Shadowbeast_03_01: Ha! I knew we'd make it! And I have its horn! I'm sure it'll impress Garos!
DIA_Griz_QA301_Shadowbeast_15_02: I'm sure it will. In the meantime, we need to finish the job.
DIA_Griz_QA301_Shadowbeast_03_03: Yes, that's right. I'm going to my post and wait for the signal!
DIA_Griz_QA301_FinishJob_03_01: Well, that would be that. A first-class case.
DIA_Griz_QA301_FinishJob_15_02: I agree. Remember to report back to Adelard for the reward.
DIA_Griz_QA301_FinishJob_03_03: I may forget about everything but the reward for a job! See you around!
DIA_Griz_QA301_AfterQuest_03_01: Hey, remember me? We hunted a shadowbeast together!
DIA_Griz_QA301_AfterQuest_15_02: Sure I remember. And they actually accepted you into the trackers!
DIA_Griz_QA301_AfterQuest_03_03: Yes, I did some more jobs for Garos and he accepted me into their ranks. But it wouldn't have been possible if you hadn't helped me with that beast!
DIA_Griz_QA301_AfterQuest_03_04: Here, this is a small token of gratitude. May it serve you well!
